dcterms:creator: Li Deng
dcterms:description: MNIST consists of 10 hand-written digits with 60,000 training and 10,000 test images, at size 28 × 28.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Yuval Netzer
Tao Wang
Adam Coates
Alessandro Bissacco
Bo Wu
Andrew Y Ng
dcterms:description: SVHN consists of 10 digit numbers with 73,257 training and 26,032 test images, at size 32 × 32; it is more challenging than MNIST, containing images from pictures of house numbers, with much more variation and many distractions present.
dcterms:title: SVHN

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR10 contains 50,000 training and 10,000 test images, also 32 × 32 and equally split between 10 classes like airplane, frog, and truck.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR100 is the same as the CIFAR10, except it has 100 classes; the resolution is still 32 × 32, and images are equally split between 100 classes.
dcterms:title: CIFAR100
